snippet: Responding to a letter, the Education Department plans to investigate whether 39 Jewish schools are providing adequate training in secular subjects.
abstract: New York City Education Dept announces intention to examine whether 39 yeshivas in Brooklyn and Queens are providing appropriate level of education in secular subjects; investigation was prompted by letter from parents and former students and teachers, organized by Young Advocates for Fair Education, that brought up their concerns with education offered.
lead_paragraph: Responding to a letter, the Education Department plans to investigate whether 39 Jewish schools are providing adequate training in secular subjects.

headline.main: New York City Questions English, Math and Science Taught at Yeshivas
headline.print_headline: City to Examine English, Math and Science Classes at 39 Yeshivas
